Class HiveIndexQueryContext

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.index.HiveIndexQueryContext

public class HiveIndexQueryContext
extends Object

Used to pass information between the IndexProcessor and the plugin IndexHandler during query processing
